Stairways.prompt: Review the observations from 2024. How many safety observations occurred in stairways? Also classify the most common safety observations occurring in stairways.

data.Title: Water puddle in hallway
data.Observation: There was a small water puddle on the packaging department floor, which caused a slip hazard.

data.Title: Wobbly railing in stairway
data.Observation: The railing in the metal stairs between production facilities was dangerously loose. The mounting failed.

data.Title: Inadequate protective equipment
data.Observation: An employee was handling powdery material without a respirator in the clean room.

data.Title: Items left in stairs
data.Observation: Empty boxes had been left on the upper landing of the stairs leading to the warehouse, creating a tripping hazard.

data.Title: Chemical splash on floor
data.Observation: There was a small amount of unidentified chemical on the laboratory floor without warning signs.

data.Title: Emergency stop button covered
data.Observation: There was a movable cart in front of the mixer unit's emergency stop button, preventing quick access.

data.Title: Slippery stair step
data.Observation: One step of the stairs leading to the maintenance level had worn to a dangerously slippery condition.

data.Title: Heavy lifting without aids
data.Observation: A warehouse worker lifted a heavy raw material bag alone without a lifting aid.

data.Title: Fire exit blocked
data.Observation: There was a pallet of cardboard waste in front of the emergency exit, narrowing the passageway.

data.Title: Broken electrical outlet
data.Observation: The cover of an electrical outlet in the locker room was cracked, risk of electric shock.

data.Title: Inadequate lighting in stairway
data.Observation: The lighting in the stairway leading to the basement facilities was insufficient, one lamp had burned out.

data.Title: Sharp edge at workstation
data.Observation: There was a sharp edge on the metal work surface of the packaging line that could cause injury.

data.Title: Tools on floor
data.Observation: After maintenance work, a wrench and screwdrivers were left on the floor.

data.Title: Liquid spill in stairway
data.Observation: Coffee had spilled on the stairs leading to the break room, causing a slip hazard.

data.Title: Dust accumulated in electrical cabinet
data.Observation: A large amount of dust had accumulated inside an old electrical cabinet in the production facility, fire risk.

data.Title: Incorrect waste sorting
data.Observation: Reactive chemical waste had been placed in the regular laboratory waste container.

data.Title: Employee running in stairs
data.Observation: An employee was observed running down the office floor stairs.

data.Title: Gas cylinders without support
data.Observation: Laboratory gas cylinders were standing freely against the wall without a chain or rack.

data.Title: Shelf overloaded
data.Observation: More goods had been stacked on the warehouse shelf than its weight limit allowed.

data.Title: Worn floor coating
data.Observation: The floor coating in the clean room had worn through, making cleaning difficult and creating a tripping hazard.

data.Title: Stair non-slip strip detached
data.Observation: The non-slip tape had detached from the edge of the step leading to the exterior door and was hanging loose.

data.Title: Damaged extension cord
data.Observation: The insulation of an office extension cord was broken, exposing internal wires.

data.Title: Eye wash bottle solution expired
data.Observation: The eye wash bottle at the emergency shower station had expired.

data.Title: Forklift speeding
data.Observation: In the warehouse area, a forklift driver was clearly driving over the permitted speed limit.

data.Title: Carrying large box in stairway
data.Observation: An employee was carrying a large box that completely blocked their view while entering the stairs.

data.Title: Incomplete safety data sheets
data.Observation: The safety data sheet for a new chemical could not be found at the workstation.

data.Title: Slippery oil stain
data.Observation: An oil stain was discovered on the production hall floor creating a slip hazard.

data.Title: Missing machine guard
data.Observation: A protective guard was missing from the packaging line's rotating part.

data.Title: Blocked sprinkler
data.Observation: Cardboard boxes had been stacked directly under a ceiling sprinkler.

data.Title: Cracked window pane
data.Observation: A window pane in the production facility was cracked creating a risk of falling glass.

data.Title: Ventilation not working
data.Observation: The ventilation system in the chemical storage room was not working.

data.Title: No hearing protection used
data.Observation: An employee was working next to a noisy machine without hearing protection.

data.Title: Cable running across floor
data.Observation: A power cable was running across the walking path on the production floor.

data.Title: Leak in roof
data.Observation: Water was dripping from the roof to the floor near the packaging station.

data.Title: Faulty door closer
data.Observation: The fire door's automatic closer was broken and the door remained open.

data.Title: Unlabeled chemical container
data.Observation: An unlabeled chemical container was found in the laboratory.

data.Title: Loose handrail in stairway
data.Observation: The stairway handrail was loose from its mounting.

data.Title: Missing eye protection
data.Observation: An employee was grinding metal without wearing safety glasses.

data.Title: Emergency exit sign not illuminated
data.Observation: The emergency exit sign in the warehouse section was not illuminated.

data.Title: Torn work gloves
data.Observation: An employee was using torn work gloves with exposed hand areas.

data.Title: Narrow passage in warehouse
data.Observation: Pallets had been placed so narrowly that safe passage was difficult.

data.Title: Machine overheating
data.Observation: The packaging machine was overheating during operation and hot to touch.

data.Title: Spilled chemicals not cleaned
data.Observation: A small chemical spill in the laboratory was not cleaned immediately.

data.Title: Broken step in stairway
data.Observation: The concrete of one step in the stairway to the basement was broken and crumbling.

data.Title: Damaged protective clothing
data.Observation: Chemical protective clothing had a tear in the leg area.

data.Title: Improper ladder use
data.Observation: An employee was standing on the top step of a ladder, which is prohibited.

data.Title: Missing safety signs
data.Observation: Warning signs for mandatory safety equipment were missing from the chemical storage area.

data.Title: Exposed electrical wiring
data.Observation: Electrical wiring in the control cabinet was exposed due to missing cover.

data.Title: Burned out stairway lighting
data.Observation: Three lamps in the warehouse stairway had burned out making it dangerously dark.

data.Title: Expired first aid supplies
data.Observation: Several items in the first aid kit had expired dates.

data.Title: Ice on exterior stairs
data.Observation: Ice had formed on the exterior stairs, sand had not been applied.

data.Title: Safety equipment check incomplete
data.Observation: Monthly safety equipment inspections had not been performed for three months.

data.Title: Forklift without horn
data.Observation: Warehouse forklift's warning horn was not working.

data.Title: Poor indoor air quality
data.Observation: Multiple employees complained about poor air quality in the packaging department.

data.Title: Improper waste disposal
data.Observation: Hazardous waste was found in the regular trash container.

data.Title: Machinery guard bypassed
data.Observation: Safety guard on drilling machine had been intentionally bypassed.

data.Title: Compressed air leak
data.Observation: Significant compressed air leak in the production line pneumatic system.

data.Title: Inadequate work platform guardrails
data.Observation: Work platform guardrails were below the required height.

data.Title: Mold in break room
data.Observation: Mold growth was discovered on the break room ceiling.

data.Title: Missing emergency contact list
data.Observation: Emergency contact list was not posted at the required location.

data.Title: Faulty emergency lighting
data.Observation: Emergency lighting did not activate during power outage test.

data.Title: Chemical storage temperature too high
data.Observation: Temperature in chemical storage room exceeded safe limits.

data.Title: Wet floor without warning signs
data.Observation: Newly mopped floor had no warning signs posted.

data.Title: Machine without operating instructions
data.Observation: New packaging machine had no operating instructions available.

data.Title: Insufficient workspace lighting
data.Observation: Quality control station had inadequate lighting for detailed work.

data.Title: Loose ceiling panel
data.Observation: Ceiling panel in production area was loose and hanging dangerously.

data.Title: Ergonomic issues at workstation
data.Observation: Workstation setup caused strain, monitor at wrong height.

data.Title: Forklift collision damage
data.Observation: Structural column showed damage from forklift collision.

data.Title: Electrical panel door left open
data.Observation: Main electrical panel door was left open and unattended.

data.Title: Trip hazard from packaging material
data.Observation: Shrink wrap and packaging materials scattered on floor.

data.Title: Unsafe material storage height
data.Observation: Materials stacked higher than recommended safe height.

data.Title: No anti-slip mats in wet area
data.Observation: Anti-slip mats missing from production area where water is used.

data.Title: Dust accumulation on equipment
data.Observation: Excessive dust buildup on electronic equipment creating fire risk.

data.Title: Insufficient safety training
data.Observation: New employee operating machinery without proper safety training.

data.Title: Blocked access to electrical panel
data.Observation: Equipment placed blocking access to electrical distribution panel.

data.Title: Conveyor belt misalignment
data.Observation: Production conveyor belt running off-center risking product spillage.

data.Title: Damaged safety helmet
data.Observation: Employee using cracked safety helmet that should be replaced.

data.Title: Pneumatic tool without safety latch
data.Observation: Pneumatic tool being used without proper safety latch mechanism.

data.Title: Slippery residue in production area
data.Observation: Oily residue on floor from production process creating slip hazard.

data.Title: Loading dock safety barriers damaged
data.Observation: Safety barriers at loading dock were bent and ineffective.

data.Title: Improper chemical mixing
data.Observation: Employee observed mixing incompatible chemicals together.

data.Title: Missing machine maintenance log
data.Observation: Critical equipment maintenance log could not be located.

data.Title: Inadequate ventilation during welding
data.Observation: Welding performed in area with insufficient ventilation.

data.Title: Safety shower blocked
data.Observation: Emergency safety shower access blocked by stored materials.

data.Title: Worn brake pads on forklift
data.Observation: Forklift brake pads severely worn during routine inspection.

data.Title: Unlocked chemical storage
data.Observation: Chemical storage cabinet found unlocked overnight.

data.Title: Pinch point not guarded
data.Observation: Machinery pinch point accessible without protective guarding.

data.Title: Unmarked floor load capacity
data.Observation: Storage area floor load capacity not marked as required.

data.Title: Frayed lifting strap
data.Observation: Lifting equipment strap showing signs of fraying and wear.

data.Title: Missing lockout/tagout devices
data.Observation: Required lockout/tagout devices not available at maintenance point.

data.Title: Excessive noise levels
data.Observation: Noise level measurements exceeded safe limits in processing area.

data.Title: Inadequate spill containment
data.Observation: Chemical storage area lacks proper spill containment system.

data.Title: Hot surface not marked
data.Observation: Equipment hot surface not marked with warning labels.

data.Title: Pressure gauge not functioning
data.Observation: Pressure gauge on compressed air system not showing accurate reading.

data.Title: Incomplete accident report
data.Observation: Recent minor accident report was incomplete and missing details.

data.Title: Unstable stacked pallets
data.Observation: Pallets stacked unevenly creating risk of collapse.

data.Title: Missing ground fault protection
data.Observation: Electrical outlet in wet area lacks ground fault circuit interrupter.

data.Title: Improper use of lifting equipment
data.Observation: Crane being used beyond its rated capacity.

data.Title: Smoking in prohibited area
data.Observation: Employee smoking in area where flammable materials are stored.

data.Title: Safety data sheets outdated
data.Observation: Several safety data sheets in binder are outdated versions.

data.Title: Defibrillator battery low
data.Observation: Automated external defibrillator showing low battery warning.

data.Title: Fork extensions not secured
data.Observation: Forklift fork extensions not properly secured with retaining pins.

data.Title: Inadequate personal fall protection
data.Observation: Worker on elevated platform without proper fall protection harness.

data.Title: Compressed gas cylinder unsecured
data.Observation: Oxygen cylinder not properly secured during transport.

data.Title: Coolant leak from machine
data.Observation: Machine coolant leaking onto floor creating slip hazard.

data.Title: Wrong fire extinguisher type
data.Observation: Class A extinguisher installed in area requiring Class C.

data.Title: Loading dock edge not marked
data.Observation: Loading dock edge lacks proper striped marking for visibility.

data.Title: Damaged electrical breaker
data.Observation: Circuit breaker in panel is physically damaged and needs replacement.

data.Title: Material handling cart wheels seized
data.Observation: Cart wheels not rotating properly creating pushing strain.

data.Title: Improper disposal of contaminated rags
data.Observation: Oil-soaked rags disposed in regular trash instead of approved container.

data.Title: Emergency evacuation route unclear
data.Observation: Evacuation route signs missing in newly renovated section.

data.Title: Machine vibration excessive
data.Observation: Production equipment vibrating excessively indicating bearing failure.

data.Title: Safety meeting not documented
data.Observation: Monthly safety meeting held but attendance not documented.

data.Title: Stairway handrail height inadequate
data.Observation: Newly installed stairway handrail below code-required height.

data.Title: Confined space entry permit missing
data.Observation: Worker entered confined space without proper permit displayed.

data.Title: Welding curtain damaged
data.Observation: Protective welding curtain has holes allowing light through.

data.Title: Improper grounding of equipment
data.Observation: Portable electrical equipment not properly grounded.

data.Title: Safety glasses not impact-rated
data.Observation: Employee using regular glasses instead of impact-rated safety glasses.

data.Title: Aisle marking tape worn away
data.Observation: Floor tape marking pedestrian aisles worn and barely visible.

data.Title: Temperature alarm not functioning
data.Observation: Cold storage temperature alarm failed to sound during test.

data.Title: Respirator cartridges expired
data.Observation: Chemical respirator filter cartridges past expiration date.

data.Title: Overhead crane inspection overdue
data.Observation: Annual overhead crane certification inspection is two months overdue.

data.Title: Waste container overfilled
data.Observation: Hazardous waste container filled beyond capacity line.

data.Title: Machine startup without warning
data.Observation: Production machine started without proper audible warning signal.

data.Title: Unauthorized modification to equipment
data.Observation: Safety interlock on equipment was bypassed without authorization.

data.Title: Stairway nosing damaged
data.Observation: Contrast edge on multiple stair treads worn and chipped.

data.Title: Inadequate machine guarding
data.Observation: Access to rotating machinery parts not properly restricted.

data.Title: Battery charging area not ventilated
data.Observation: Forklift battery charging area lacks proper ventilation system.

data.Title: Pressurized hose near heat source
data.Observation: Compressed air hose routed too close to hot equipment.

data.Title: No posted maximum load capacity
data.Observation: Mezzanine floor lacks posted maximum load capacity sign.

data.Title: Broken mirror at blind corner
data.Observation: Safety mirror at warehouse blind intersection is cracked.

data.Title: Oil spill on stairway
data.Observation: Small oil spill discovered on stairs leading to lower production level.

data.Title: Improper use of step stool
data.Observation: Employee using wheeled office chair instead of proper step stool.

data.Title: Dust collector filter saturated
data.Observation: Dust collection system filter completely saturated reducing efficiency.

data.Title: Missing safety data for new process
data.Observation: New manufacturing process implemented without safety review.

data.Title: Eyewash station water stagnant
data.Observation: Emergency eyewash station water appears stagnant and discolored.

data.Title: Boom lift stabilizers not deployed
data.Observation: Aerial work platform being used with stabilizers not fully extended.

data.Title: Portable heater near combustibles
data.Observation: Space heater positioned too close to cardboard storage.

data.Title: Anti-fatigue mat curled edges
data.Observation: Workstation anti-fatigue mat edges curled creating trip hazard.

data.Title: Cutting tool without guard
data.Observation: Paper cutter blade guard removed and not reinstalled.

data.Title: Load shifting on pallet
data.Observation: Improperly secured load shifting during forklift transport.

data.Title: Hydraulic fluid leak
data.Observation: Press machine leaking hydraulic fluid onto floor.

data.Observation: Rotating warning light on equipment not functioning.

data.Observation: Industrial scale calibration certificate expired six months ago.

data.Observation: Laboratory fume hood not maintaining minimum airflow velocity.

data.Observation: Maintenance supplies being stored under stairway creating obstruction.

data.Observation: Control panel buttons obscured by dirt and grime.

data.Observation: Welding equipment cables showing exposed wire through insulation.

data.Observation: Floor drain cover missing creating fall hazard.

data.Observation: Inspection station lighting inadequate for quality control work.

data.Observation: Equipment positioned blocking emergency exit doorway.

data.Observation: Step ladder rubber feet worn off creating instability.

data.Title: Department A: Electrical cord damaged
data.Observation: Extension cord in Department A has exposed wiring from insulation damage.

data.Title: Department A: Aisle marking faded
data.Observation: Floor markings defining walkways in Department A are worn and barely visible.

data.Title: Department A: Material stored unsafely
data.Observation: Raw materials stacked higher than recommended height in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Dust accumulation excessive
data.Observation: Heavy dust buildup on electrical equipment creating fire risk in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Faulty door closer
data.Observation: Fire-rated door in Department A not closing automatically due to broken closer.

data.Title: Department A: No hearing protection
data.Observation: Worker operating loud equipment in Department A without hearing protection.

data.Title: Department A: Ladder unstable
data.Observation: A-frame ladder in Department A wobbles due to bent leg.

data.Title: Department A: Coolant spray uncontained
data.Observation: Machine coolant spraying beyond work area in Department A creating slip hazard.

data.Title: Department A: Warning beacon not working
data.Observation: Overhead crane warning light not functioning in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Safety harness damaged
data.Observation: Fall protection equipment in Department A showing frayed straps.

data.Title: Department A: Exit sign not illuminated
data.Observation: Emergency exit sign at rear of Department A not lit.

data.Title: Department A: Chemical container unlabeled
data.Observation: Secondary container with chemical solution in Department A lacks proper label.

data.Title: Department A: Welding curtain torn
data.Observation: Protective curtain around welding area in Department A has large tear.

data.Title: Department A: Bench grinder shield missing
data.Observation: Transparent safety shield removed from bench grinder in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Material cart overturned
data.Observation: Wheeled cart tipped over in Department A due to uneven floor.

data.Title: Department A: Pressure gauge not reading
data.Observation: Hydraulic system pressure gauge in Department A appears to be stuck at zero.

data.Title: Department A: Eyewash station blocked
data.Observation: Emergency eyewash station access in Department A obstructed by storage.

data.Title: Department A: No machine operating manual
data.Observation: New equipment installed in Department A without operating procedures posted.

data.Title: Department A: Hand tool damaged
data.Observation: Hammer with cracked handle being used in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Forklift clearance insufficient
data.Observation: Forklift mast raised near low ceiling in Department A without adequate clearance.

data.Title: Department A: Floor drain cover loose
data.Observation: Drain grate in Department A floor shifts when stepped on.

data.Title: Department A: Machine overheating issue
data.Observation: Assembly machine in Department A running excessively hot during operation.

data.Title: Department A: Safety mat not functioning
data.Observation: Pressure-sensitive safety mat at machine entrance in Department A not triggering shutdown.

data.Title: Department A: Improper lifting technique
data.Observation: Employee observed lifting heavy load incorrectly in Department A.

data.Title: Department A: Light curtain misaligned
data.Observation: Safety light curtain on press in Department A not properly aligned.

data.Title: Department A: Chip evacuator clogged
data.Observation: Machine chip removal system in Department A completely blocked.

data.Title: Department B: Robot safety fence breach
data.Observation: Gap in safety fencing around robotic cell in Assembly B allows unauthorized entry.

data.Title: Department B: Conveyor belt tracking issue
data.Observation: Assembly B conveyor belt running off-center risking material spillage.

data.Title: Department B: Workstation chair broken
data.Observation: Operator chair in Assembly B has damaged hydraulic cylinder causing sudden height drops.

data.Title: Department B: Chemical odor detected
data.Observation: Strong solvent smell noticed in Assembly B possibly indicating ventilation problem.

data.Title: Department B: Load cell malfunctioning
data.Observation: Weight scale on Assembly B conveyor showing inconsistent readings.

data.Title: Department B: Air quality complaint
data.Observation: Multiple workers in Assembly B reported breathing difficulties and poor air circulation.

data.Title: Department B: Control panel buttons sticky
data.Observation: Assembly B machine control panel buttons difficult to press due to contamination.

data.Title: Department B: Assembly fixture looseness
data.Observation: Work holding fixture in Assembly B not clamping parts securely.

data.Title: Department B: Ergonomic concern raised
data.Observation: Workstation height in Assembly B causing worker to maintain awkward posture.

data.Title: Department B: Parts bin overfilled
data.Observation: Component storage bin in Assembly B filled beyond safe capacity.

data.Title: Department B: Safety glasses fogging
data.Observation: Workers in Assembly B complaining that safety glasses fog up constantly.

data.Title: Department B: Tool holder broken
data.Observation: Pneumatic tool balancer in Assembly B not supporting tool weight properly.

data.Title: Department B: Lighting intermittent
data.Observation: Overhead lights in Assembly B section flickering on and off periodically.

data.Title: Department B: Assembly jig alignment off
data.Observation: Assembly B production fixture appears misaligned affecting product quality.

data.Title: Department B: Static electricity shocks
data.Observation: Workers in Assembly B experiencing frequent static electricity discharges.

data.Title: Department B: Component feeder jamming
data.Observation: Automatic parts feeder in Assembly B jamming frequently during operation.

data.Title: Department B: Floor marking worn away
data.Observation: Work zone boundary lines on Assembly B floor no longer visible.

data.Title: Department B: Torque wrench needs calibration
data.Observation: Assembly B torque tool past due for accuracy verification.

data.Title: Department B: Parts dropping from conveyor
data.Observation: Components falling off Assembly B transfer conveyor at curve section.

data.Title: Department B: Barcode scanner malfunction
data.Observation: Assembly B tracking scanner failing to read product codes consistently.

data.Title: Department B: Pneumatic air gun trigger stuck
data.Observation: Air gun trigger in Assembly B stuck in engaged position causing continuous air stream.

data.Title: Department B: Electric motor burning smell
data.Observation: Assembly B conveyor system motor emitting burning odor during operation.

data.Title: Department B: Work clothing storage cabinet full
data.Observation: Assembly B work uniform storage cabinet overflowing with some clothes on floor.

data.Title: Department B: Emergency shower water not flowing
data.Observation: Assembly B emergency shower test revealed insufficient water pressure flow.

data.Title: Department B: Robot cell not recognizing components
data.Observation: Assembly B robotic cell failing to identify components due to vision system malfunction.

data.Title: Department B: Floor tear
data.Observation: Assembly B floor has developed approximately 30 cm tear that could cause tripping.

data.Title: Department B: Pneumatic hose quick-connect leak
data.Observation: Assembly B compressed air hose quick-connector constantly leaking air.

data.Title: Department B: Conveyor belt slipping
data.Observation: Assembly B transport belt slipping on rollers causing uneven conveying.

data.Title: Department B: Workstation light flickering
data.Observation: Assembly B workstation LED fixture flickering annoyingly.

data.Title: Department B: Angle grinder vibrating excessively
data.Observation: Assembly B angle grinder vibrating abnormally strongly during use.

data.Title: Department B: Air purifier filter clogged
data.Observation: Assembly B air purifier filter completely clogged with dust.

data.Title: Department B: Hoist operating manual missing
data.Observation: Assembly B lifting device manual missing preventing new personnel training.

data.Title: Department B: Floor heating not working
data.Observation: Assembly B floor heating not functioning and floor is cold.

data.Title: Department B: Tool cart tipped over
data.Observation: Assembly B tool cart tipped when moved on uneven floor.

data.Title: Department B: Pressure gauge reading zero
data.Observation: Assembly B hydraulic pump pressure gauge shows zero despite system running.

data.Title: Department B: Protective curtain torn
data.Observation: Assembly B welding station protective curtain torn in multiple places.

data.Title: Department B: Warning tape detached
data.Observation: Assembly B hazardous area warning tape had detached from floor.

data.Title: Department B: Compressed air hose whipping
data.Observation: Assembly B compressed air hose came loose and began whipping dangerously.

data.Title: Department B: Lifting hook safety latch broken
data.Observation: Assembly B lifting hook safety latch no longer functioning.

data.Title: Department B: Workstation extraction system clogged
data.Observation: Assembly B workstation extraction system blocked and not drawing air at all.

data.Title: Department B: Floor drain smells
data.Observation: Assembly B floor drain emitting unpleasant odor.

data.Title: Department B: Roller conveyor running too fast
data.Observation: Assembly B roller track speed increased and components falling off easily.

data.Title: Department B: Emergency stop circuit not working
data.Observation: Assembly B emergency stop circuit failed to stop machine during test.

data.Title: Department B: Workstation table wobbling
data.Observation: Assembly B workstation table wobbling dangerously and threatening to collapse.

data.Title: Department B: Compressed air dryer not working
data.Observation: Assembly B compressed air dryer malfunctioning with moisture in air.

data.Title: Department B: Conveyor scale reading incorrect
data.Observation: Assembly B conveyor scale consistently shows 5 kg too light weight.
